actions.name: Group
actions.title: Create Email A keys, Targets and Event

properties.display_name: Create Email A keys, Targets and Event

properties.body:
{
  "name": "SXO SMTP Automation Account",
  "title": "SXO SMTP Automation Account",
  "properties": {
    "no_runtime_user": false,
    "protocol": "SMTP",
    "display_name": "SXO SMTP Automation Account",
    "default_runtime_user_id": "$activity.definition_activity_01MCQVB8PKXSS1P8eYQjfrwxMhxCoXMkf04.output.jsonpath_queries.Email Runtime ID$",
    "server": "mail.ao-local.com",
    "port": 587
  },
  "type": "email.smtp_endpoint",
  "base_type": "target"
}

{
  "name": "SXO IMAP Automation Account",
  "title": "SXO IMAP Automation Account",
  "properties": {
    "ignore_certificate_errors": true,
    "port": 993,
    "protocol": "IMAP",
    "tls_enabled": true,
    "polling_interval": 30,
    "display_name": "SXO IMAP Automation Account",
    "default_runtime_user_id": "$activity.definition_activity_01MCQVB8PKXSS1P8eYQjfrwxMhxCoXMkf04.output.jsonpath_queries.Email Runtime ID$",
    "server": "mail.ao-local.com"
  },
  "type": "email.imap_endpoint",
  "base_type": "target"
}
